| 5 |  | #P_df-drngo | |- DivRingOps = { <. g , h >. | ( <. g , h >. e. RingOps /\ ( h |` ( ( ran g \ { ( GId ` g ) } ) X. ( ran g \ { ( GId ` g ) } ) ) ) e. GrpOp ) } |
